name: push-api-demo
description: This is an attempt to create a simple chatroom example to demonstrate the [Push API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Push_API). It also illustrates some uses of [Service Workers](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Service_Worker_API), and how to use [Channel Messaging](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Channel_Messaging_API) to communicate data between a Service Worker and the main window context.
